# Pylint and linting dependencies for CI
# These are lightweight dependencies needed for code style checking
# Heavy ML/AI packages (faiss, torch, llama-cpp, sentence-transformers) are excluded
# as they're not needed for linting and may not have wheels for all Python versions

pylint>=3.0.0
fastapi>=0.104.0
pydantic>=2.0.0
pyyaml>=6.0
python-dotenv>=1.0.0
requests>=2.31.0
beautifulsoup4>=4.12.0
langchain>=0.1.0
pandas>=2.0.0
